introduction_text:
Dear Rotaractor,


Congratulations on taking your first step towards a challenging and exciting opportunity! We seek Rotaractors like you to create a positive influence on our dear Rotaract clubs.

Through this application, we hope to understand a little more about you, your Rotaract journey and how we can build the Seventh year of Rotaract 3141.


Let us begin the Conqueror’s journey!


This application has five parts and covers different aspects of you!

[Please Note: Kindly fill this form only after reading THE COUNCIL CRITERIA DOCUMENT thoroughly]


The document is available here: https://bit.ly/DistrictCouncilDocket2022-23


For any further details, you may connect to:

Rtr. Aastha Parekh || districtsecretary2223@gmail.com

Rtr. Harshita Sewani || rtr.harshita.sewani@gmail.com


Regards,

D.R.R. Rtr. Gemin Shah

R.I. Year: 22-23
name: council-application
success_message:
Your response has been successfully submitted. 
You will receive a pdf of your Council Application Form soon on the provided Email Id.
title: District Council Application 2022-23

web_form_fields.description: This will help us to understand how you as a leader would want to take this organisation ahead and how important it is for you to be a part of council.
web_form_fields.label: D . LEADERSHIP

web_form_fields.description: Suppose you were to explain - What is Rotaract to a non-rotaractor, what would you say?
web_form_fields.label: Define Rotaract in the most efficient way*
What do you expect to experience from this opportunity?*
What motivates you to be a part of the council?*

web_form_fields.description: (This Section is mandatory and ensures that your club President 22-23 is aware and okay with you working on the Council Team)
web_form_fields.label: E . NO OBJECTION CERTIFICATE FROM CLUB

web_form_fields.description:
As President 22-23 of the applicant's home club have no objection for him/her to represent the District Council Member and it would be an honour for the club to have him/her serve on the district body.

As part of the responsibility, we understand that our club member will have to prioritize and balance the activities  of district and club and in certain situation make an informed decision.

Only applicable in case of club change :-

As President 21-22 of the applicant's Rotaract Club we have no objection for him/her to change the Rotaract Club for the year 22-23 and wish the applicant the best in their future endeavours.
(*If the President Elect is not announced, then the signature of the President 21-22 is compulsory. 
If the President 21-22 of the Club is the applicant, AND the President-Elect is not announced, signature of the Immediate Past President is compulsory.)
web_form_fields.label: No Objection Certificate

web_form_fields.description: Mention the name of president who is going to sign the form on the behalf of the Club.
web_form_fields.label: Name of the President*
I certify that the information shared above is true to my knowledge*
